description: "This 18th century map of Southeast Asia by the French cartographer Gilles Robert de Vaugondy features the national borders of the Philippines in green, and of modern Indonesia in yellow. The Malay Peninsula and modern Cambodia and Vietnam are in red."
title: "Archipel   des   Indes   Orientales   :   qui   comprend   les   Isles   de   la   Sonde,   Moluques   et   Philippines"
